metadata.title: CVE-2015-4176 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
fs/namespace.c in the Linux kernel before 4.0.2 does not properly supportmount connectivity, which allows local users to read arbitrary files byleveraging user-namespace root access for deletion of a file or directory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4176` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
